Jakarta EE Platform API v10.0.0

Package jakarta.xml.bind.util

Useful client utility classes.

References in this document to JAXB refer to the Jakarta XML Binding unless otherwise noted.

Package Specification

  • Jakarta XML Binding Specification project

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:

  • The Jakarta XML Binding Website
See Also:
Jakarta XML Binding Website
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JAXBResult
    JAXP Result implementation that unmarshals a Jakarta XML Binding object.
    JAXBSource
    JAXP Source implementation that marshals a Jakarta XML Binding-generated object.
    ValidationEventCollector
    ValidationEventHandler implementation that collects all events.
